TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Compensator extends System.EnterpriseServices.ServicedComponent

summary.span: 表示所有 Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) 補償器的基底類別。

span.span: Represents the base class for all Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) Compensators.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者應該以撰寫自訂的交易補償器延伸此物件。The user should extend from this object in order to write a custom transaction Compensator. 補償器一定要有一個公用建構函式;否則，復原引擎無法建立它。A Compensator must always have a public constructor; otherwise, the recovery engine cannot create it. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 建立 Compensating Resource Manager (CRM)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0a8a024b-0be1-4519-a659-076577278029)。For more information, see [How to: Create a Compensating Resource Manager (CRM)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0a8a024b-0be1-4519-a659-076577278029). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個類別。The following code example demonstrates the use of this class. [!code-cpp[EnterpriseServices_Crm#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Crm/cpp/crmserver.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[EnterpriseServices_Crm#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Crm/CS/crmserver.cs#20)] [!code-vb[EnterpriseServices_Crm#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Crm/VB/crmserver.vb#20)] 此補償器會使用下列的背景工作類別。This compensator is used by the following worker class. [!code-cpp[EnterpriseServices_Crm#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Crm/cpp/crmserver.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[EnterpriseServices_Crm#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Crm/CS/crmserver.cs#10)] [!code-vb[EnterpriseServices_Crm#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Crm/VB/crmserver.vb#10)] 下列程式碼範例會示範這個補償器 」 和 「 背景工作角色的用戶端。The following code example demonstrates a client that exercises this compensator and worker. [!code-cpp[EnterpriseServices_Crm#30](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Crm/cpp/crmclient.cpp#30)] [!code-csharp[EnterpriseServices_Crm#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Crm/CS/crmclient.cs#30)] [!code-vb[EnterpriseServices_Crm#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Crm/VB/crmclient.vb#30)]

summary.span: 告知 Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) 補償器，它在中止階段期間已經收到所有可用的記錄檔資料錄。
